sentences: Kui sa ei tea midagi teha, siis alles las püksid peale!
Kõikjal mujal ei jää sellest vaimustus enne kui just siin, alles siin.
context: 'Alles' is used to emphasize that something remains or continues unchanged. It can also mean 'only' or 'just' when used in a sentence to limit the scope of an action or situation.
